name: Human Farm - Rehabilitation
description:
This is a game in which huge boobs are milked incessantly.
It is recommended for those who love huge boobs and girls being milked.
Enjoy watching this sassy gal lose herself in pleasure!

Synopsis


In a world where human farms are publicly set up, one delinquent girl has to be housed in one of the farms, also known as a training facility.
The name of the strong-willed and cheeky girl, is "Aina".
She tries to escape from the facility, but her body gradually adapts as a cow, and...?

Can she escape !?
Huge boobs will be milked ceaselessly!


Staffs try to catch you and punish you!
Enjoy the characters losing themselves in pleasure by the relentless punishments!


One of the cows used to be Aina's best friend!?
You can also enjoy the entanglement of the two!


Explore the farm by choosing your action!


Game Features


  • Escape RPG mini-game
  • 15 basic CGs
  • 16 erotic scenes (including end)
  • 7 endings (including no erotic scenes)
  • Choose the action of the heroine and explore this farm!

Recollection room (erotic scene and end scene)
Open all erotic scenes with a button(end scenes are not included)
